title: Placements!
content: Seniors do you have any idea how many T1 companies come during Nov-Dec placements?

comments.body: Ir depends on the year but usually all the good companies come in the first 4-5 months but companies come for the whole year
Would you rather take a t2 fte plus internship and try for t1 next semester or wait for t1 company right now
Well placement office allow you to take only one internship so if you take fte + internship for a t2 company you can sit for t1 fte companies only not t1 fte + internship

I'd take the fte for sure. So many of my frnds got good internships and didn't get converted. Same thing happened to me. But a guaranteed job is the best option imo unless you're really sure you'll get a t1 internship and get converted. The market still hasn't gone back to normal so I'd suggest taking the fte when you have the chance. Getting hired as a fresher outside of placements is pretty hard, especially now
Companies come in their own time. You have to keep track of it.
